title.narrative: Introduce sustainable waste management to the Pacific Region of Colombia delivering a model that can be replicated across the country

description.narrative: Introduce sustainable waste management systems in Guapi and Nuqui, and develop a toolkit that can be used by other Municipalities in Colombia. The project's primary aim will be to address the urgent need to put in place appropriate waste collection and disposal measures whilst, in parallel, developing a medium term strategy focused on improving recycling/composting and treatment of residual waste to reduce landfill disposal. UK expertise will be showcased to main decision makers in the region and at National Level through the Ministry of Housing and Presidency programmes for poverty alleviation.
